body: If we support batch frobenius norm, why do we not support nuclear norm? After all, they should eventually will be called from the same python function.
body_html: If we support batch frobenius norm, why do we not support nuclear norm? After all, they should eventually will be called from the same python function.
body_text: If we support batch frobenius norm, why do we not support nuclear norm? After all, they should eventually will be called from the same python function.
